Hey, BD Armory has an Air to Air Artificial Intelligence module now. You can have dogfights against unmanned planes.

Which means, you can add Air to Air missions. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
Yes, air-to-air missions would be amazing.
"A squadron of 3 enemy fighters are closing in on KSC! Scramble your best jet and get out there and defend us!"
YES! Air to air missions trump all!

I would absolutely love Air to Air! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

You could do things like attacking a bunch of fighter craft, or maybe a bigger-bomber style craft with some aa-guns on it and escort, maybe a cloud of crafts and you only need to kill a VIP, maybe combined ground/air attack. No clue about how complicated the coding is, but it should work in the game mechanics.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T15:55:42Z" title="05/06/2015 03:55  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by Temeter**
Also, I seriously hope there's a mission for destroying enemy fighters parked at the island runway.
I haven't tested this yet but does it assign missions for specific weapons? If so perhaps you would be interested in mini addons for using Spanner's boom sticks, P.E.W, and Never Enuff Dakka?

> 
> Also, I seriously hope there's a mission for destroying enemy fighters parked at the island runway.
